mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_order( id, sys_user_id, order_id, type, status, create_date, update_date, user_order_address_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sysUserId}, #{businessOrderId}, #{type}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{userOrderAddressId} )

INSERT INTO order_product_relation( id, business_order_id, business_product_id, product_num, seckill_id, product_spec ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{businessOrderId}, #{businessProductId}, #{productNum}, #{seckillId}, #{productSpec} )
mapper.select: SELECT opr.* FROM order_product_relation opr WHERE opr.business_order_id=#{orderId}
SELECT opr.* FROM business_order bo,order_product_relation opr WHERE bo.order_id=opr.business_order_id and bo.status="3" and bo.sys_user_id=#{userId}

select bor.order_id businessOrderId,bpr.product_id businessProductId,bpr.product_prefecture productPrefecture,bpr.status AS productStatus,bpr.product_amount productAmount,opr.product_num businessProductNum, opr.product_spec productSpec,bpr.first_url businessProductFirstUrl,bpr.`name` businessProductName,bpr.price businessProductPrice from business_order bor, order_product_relation opr, business_product bpr where bor.order_id=opr.business_order_id and bor.sys_user_id=#{userId} and bor.`status`="3" and opr.business_product_id=bpr.product_id
select o.*,o.order_id AS businessOrderId from business_order o where o.order_id=#{orderId}

select bor.order_id businessOrderId,bpr.product_id businessProductId,opr.product_num businessProductNum, opr.product_spec productSpec,bpr.first_url businessProductFirstUrl,bpr.`name` businessProductName,bpr.price businessProductPrice,bor.status status from business_order bor, order_product_relation opr, business_product bpr where bor.order_id=opr.business_order_id and bor.sys_user_id=#{sysUserId} and bpr.`type`=#{type} and opr.business_product_id=bpr.product_id and opr.business_product_id=#{businessProductId}

SELECT ,u.nickname,u.mobile,u.identify_number,p.transaction_id,p.pay_date,p.status AS pay_status from business_order o LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id=o.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN pay_record p on o.order_id = p.order_id LEFT JOIN ( select order_id,max(pay_date) pay_date from pay_record group by order_id ) b ON p.pay_date=b.pay_date where p.order_id=b.order_id ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC
limit #{pageStartNo},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) from business_order o LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id=o.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN pay_record p on o.order_id = p.order_id LEFT JOIN ( select order_id,max(pay_date) pay_date from pay_record group by order_id ) b ON p.pay_date=b.pay_date where p.order_id=b.order_id

select bor.id,bor.sys_user_id sysUserId,bor.order_id businessOrderId,bpr.product_id businessProductId,bpr.product_amount productAmount,opr.product_num businessProductNum, opr.product_spec productSpec,bpr.first_url businessProductFirstUrl,bpr.`name` businessProductName, bpr.price businessProductPrice,bor.status status, bor.create_date createDate,sa.favorable_price payAmount,bor.type from business_order bor left join order_product_relation opr on bor.order_id=opr.business_order_id left join business_product bpr on opr.business_product_id=bpr.product_id LEFT JOIN seckill_activity_field saf on saf.id = bor.seckill_id LEFT JOIN seckill_activity sa on sa.id = saf.activity_id
where bor.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO month_transaction_record( id, transaction_id, sys_user_id, amount, create_date, update_date, next_user_id, user_type, next_user_type, parent_relation, user_mobile, next_user_mobile, user_identify_number, next_user_identify_number, user_nickname, next_user_nickname ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{transactionId}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{nextUserId}, #{userType}, #{nextUserType}, #{parentRelation}, #{mobile}, #{nextUserMobile}, #{identifyNumber}, #{nextUserIdentifyNumber}, #{nickName}, #{nextUserNickName} )
mapper.select: SELECT ord.order_id,ord.update_date,ord.`status`,ord.type,usr.mobile,ord.user_order_address_id ,pay.amount,MAX(pay.pay_date) AS pay_date,pay.transaction_id ,oar.user_name_address,oar.user_phone_address,oar.user_province_address,oar.user_city_address,oar.user_detail_address ,pro.`name`,pro.price,pro.product_id,pro.brand ,opr.product_spec,opr.product_num FROM business_order ord LEFT JOIN sys_user usr ON ord.sys_user_id = usr.id LEFT JOIN order_product_relation opr ON ord.order_id = opr.business_order_id LEFT JOIN business_product pro ON opr.business_product_id = pro.product_id LEFT JOIN pay_record pay ON ord.order_id = pay.order_id LEFT JOIN order_address_relation oar ON oar.business_order_id = ord.order_id WHERE ord.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_order_address SET user_name=#{userName}, user_phone=#{userPhone}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, detail_address=#{detailAddress} WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT ord.* FROM business_order ord, order_product_relation opr, sys_user su WHERE ord.order_id = opr.business_order_id AND ord.sys_user_id = su.id AND opr.business_product_id = #{productId} AND ord.sys_user_id = #{userId} AND ord.status!="0" AND ord.status!="5" AND ord.status!="3" AND ord.status!="del"

select ord.order_id,pro.product_id,pro.name,pro.brand,usr.id,usr.nickname,usr.mobile,pay.pay_date,pay.amount,pay.invoice, opr.product_num,ord.status,opr.product_spec, ddr.user_name_address,ddr.user_phone_address,CONCAT(ddr.user_province_address," ",ddr.user_city_address," ",ddr.user_detail_address) as userAddress FROM business_order ord,business_product pro,sys_user usr,pay_record pay, order_product_relation opr, order_address_relation ddr WHERE ord.sys_user_id = usr.id AND ord.order_id = opr.business_order_id AND opr.business_product_id = pro.product_id AND ord.order_id = pay.order_id AND ord.order_id = ddr.business_order_id AND pro.type = "offline" AND ord.status = "1" AND pay.status="1" ORDER BY pay_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_cop_relation( id, order_id, waybill_number, transaction_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{waybillNumber}, #{transactionId} )
mapper.select: SELECT pay_date,sys_user_id,transaction_id,order_id,sum(amount) amount FROM pay_record pp WHERE pp.transaction_id in( SELECT p.transaction_id from pay_record p WHERE p.pay_date in (SELECT min(pay_date) pay_date from pay_record WHERE amount > 497 AND `status` ="1" AND pay_date BETWEEN "2018-04-15 00:00:00" AND "2018-06-13 23:59:59" GROUP BY sys_user_id )) GROUP BY sys_user_id
